definition: each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)

sentences.english: If being ugly were a crime, I'd have to arrest half the people in this city.
sentences.chinese: 如果相貌丑也要抓，那这城里一半人都要蹲牢里了。

sentences.english: They take themselves seriously the appearance of other in part, with be concerned about face-saving about.
sentences.chinese: 他们重视自己另一半的相貌，与爱面子有关。

sentences.english: Fortune reigns in gifts of the world, not in lineament of nature .
sentences.chinese: 命运之神是人世间恩惠的主宰，不能支配自然的相貌。

sentences.english: And the handsome young men must have something to live on as well as the plain.
sentences.chinese: 英俊的男人和相貌平常的男人一样都得得靠钱过活啊。

sentences.english: Xiao Li was a talented girl, but quite plain-looking.
sentences.chinese: 小丽是个才女，但是相貌平平。

sentences.english: Some say physical appearance matters even more to employers than a cover letter.
sentences.chinese: 有些研究称相貌对雇主来说甚至比求职信还重要。
她继承了她母亲的相貌。

sentences.english: Tom is like his father in looks.
For example, the rich and well-born are not always good looking.
sentences.chinese: 例如，富人和出生好的人并不总是好相貌。

sentences.english: He's got two very similar-looking daughters.
sentences.chinese: 他有两个相貌很相似的女儿。

sentences.english: He found a correlation between good looks and success.
sentences.chinese: 他发现好的相貌和成功之间存在一种相关性。

sentences.english: Agood face is a letter of recommendation.
sentences.chinese: 好的相貌就是一封推举的介绍信。

sentences.english: One of the proprietors had suggested that the chorus was a little weak on looks.
sentences.chinese: 有一个东家曾经提到过，群舞队员的相貌差了一些。

sentences.english: I was very disappointed to see her sister; she was a homely girl.
sentences.chinese: 我看到她的妹妹很失望，她是一个相貌平平的女孩。

sentences.english: 5A noble chafer beetle which relies on the decaying wood of old fruit trees.
sentences.chinese: 一只相貌尊贵的金龟子甲虫正以老果树的腐木为食。

sentences.english: Intervene when one child teases another about his or her physical appearance.
sentences.chinese: 如果有孩子取笑另一个孩子的身体相貌，作出干涉。

definition: five sense organs of TCM (nose, eyes, lips, tongue, ears 鼻目口舌耳)/facial features
